body:
I'd like to congratulate the following users on their promotions during the Avicore update

AviGill
Community Manager -> Director 

Howsie22
Staff Manager -> Director

izjust4fun 
Sr Mod -> Manager

The_Detonator_ 
Sr Mod -> Manager

tel6331
Sr Mod -> Manager

1Theodore1 
Jr Mod -> Mod

Updates on staff applications will also be coming soon.
